long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply select the text of the quote on the page you want to save. Click the "Q" icon next to the address bar and your selected quote and the URL are saved.
If you want to search through the previously saved quotes - just click the icon again and use the search field to look for the quote you saved previously.
